casebody.data:
Harry WILLIAMS
v.
ADVANCE AUTO PARTS, INC., and Advance Stores Company, Incorporated d/b/a Advance Auto Parts No. 55P17 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 3, 2017 Donald J. Dunn, Attorney at Law, Goldsboro, for Williams, Harry. John C. Millberg, Attorney at Law, B. Tyler Brooks, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Advance Auto Parts, Inc., et al.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 15th of February 2017 by Plaintiff in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 3rd of May 2017."
